mapper.delete: delete from TOUR_LIKE where MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} and TOUR_ID=#{tourId}
mapper.select: select X.rnum, X.COMMENT_CONTENT, X.COMMENT_DATE, (select MEMBER_NICK from MEMBER where X.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER_NO) CMEMBER_NICK from (select rownum as rnum, A.COMMENT_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.TOUR_ID, A.COMMENT_CONTENT, A.COMMENT_DATE from (select COMMENT_NO,MEMBER_NO, TOUR_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE from COMMENTS where TOUR_ID=#{tourId} order by COMMENT_NO desc) A where rownum <= ${end}) X join MEMBER M on X.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO where X.rnum >= ${start}
select count(*) total_count from COMMENTS where TOUR_ID=#{tourId}
